# @ebay/openapi-ref-resolver-ebay

The module adapts openapi type reference resolution specific to ebay openapi schema references.

Example: 

```yaml
$ref: /base-types.yaml/#components/schemas/type
```
This will resolve to `@ebay/base-types-ebay/base-types.yaml/#components/schemas/type`.
The external type should be available as part of base-types-ebay module.

The module should not be used outside of ebay platform scope.

## Install

```bash
yarn add @ebay/openapi-ref-resolver-ebay
```

## Usage

```js
const refResolver = require('@ebay/openapi-ref-resolver-ebay');
const moduleRefResolver = require('@ebay/openapi-ebay').createModuleResolver(refResolver);

const Parser = require('swagger-parser');
await Parser.bundle('openapi.yaml'), {
    resolve: {
        module: moduleRefResolver
    }
});
```
